**Source data** this package works with:

- "standard" texts of the Masoretic text, Vulgate, Septuagint and Targum Onkelos.  (On [github](https://github.com/neelsmith/compnov))
- original transcriptions of the Latin glosses on the Septuagint and Targum Onkelos. (On [github](https://github.com/neelsmith/complutensian-texts))



**APIs** for all [exported functions](./apis.qmd) in this package
